participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Jake is practical and hardworking, with a strong sense of responsibility. He has a laid-back attitude but is deeply passionate about his work.
participant_1.background: my dad taught me everything i know. i'm a construction worker. my cats are very special to me. i've 5 cats. i enjoy building houses.

participant_2.name: Linda
participant_2.personality: Linda is reflective and a bit cynical, often using humor to mask her loneliness. She's a dreamer, with a fierce imagination regarding her ambitions.
participant_2.background: i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper. i'm a 56 year old woman. i have two grown children who never visit. i used to be pretty but time has not been kind. i fantasize about taking over the world.
